function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of vital information about the ease of spread of the virus","Impact":"Difficulty in containing the disease due to incomplete understanding of transmission","Mitigation":"Enhanced research and sharing of information on virus transmission","Technologies":"Real-time data sharing and advanced epidemiological tools","People":"Global population","Owner":"Health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in data access due to sensitivity for national security reasons","Impact":"Limited access to important information for disease containment and prevention","Mitigation":"Balancing national security needs with public health imperatives","Technologies":"Secure data sharing and communication systems","People":"Government authorities, health organizations","Owner":"Government authorities, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Significant impacts on local economies due to disease outbreaks","Impact":"Economic losses in tourism, travel, and retail sales industries","Mitigation":"Investment in resilient urban infrastructures and contingency planning","Technologies":"Smart city models, thermal imagery sensors, urban infrastructure development","People":"Local business owners, workers, and residents","Owner":"City planners, economic development agencies"}]}
